A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The writing is atrocious\, with huge plot holes looming everywhere you look. Character development is non-existent for all but Kylo Ren\, which is the only character I left interested in at all. In nearly every scene there is a joke forcefully jammed in\, whether it fits or not. The lack of experience shows through from the director\, writer\, and actors. I can confidently say I have no plans to view Epsiode IX after this debacle. Disney is putting on a clinic on how to ruin a massively valuable IP. An immensely disappointing experience for a lifelong Star Wars fan.
